Package eecs

Provides basic I/O and a wrapper around the Jago simulation environment.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Gui A wrapper for text based programming.
GuiBase A set of commands used to wrap normal Java GUI commands into an easy to use implementation that doesn't require knowledge of object oriented programming.
NavigatorRobotGui DOCUMENT ME!
RobotGui A GUI used for running simulations using the Lego robot simulator.
RobotGuiBase CLASS DOCUMENTATION INCOMPLETE
RouletteGui A roulette simulation.
SlotMachineGui DOCUMENT ME!
 

Package eecs Description

Provides basic I/O and a wrapper around the Jago simulation environment. The two options are the Gui and RobotGui; a class that extends the Gui class will provide basic text-based input/output, the RobotGui adds the capability to interact with the simulation.

Package Specification

No details.
